EmailTemplate.description: For leads you have not been able to contact - use after multiple contact attempts
EmailTemplate.name: ProSeries-Uncontacted
EmailTemplate.subject: Now’s the Time – Take a Look at ProSeries
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
I’ve tried contacting you before, but unfortunately we just haven’t been able to connect. Now is a great time to take a closer look at ProSeries®, as you file your tax season 2012 extensions and before the crush of the 2013 tax season arrives. I’m certain that once you really understand what ProSeries can do for your practice, the decision will be easy.
Here are some of the reasons tax professionals like you decide to go with ProSeries:
- File returns faster – with less hassle and more confidence. 20+ built-in time saving features like Missing Client Data Tool, ProSeries Tax Import, and Modernized E-File Support can save you valuable hours every tax season. - Backed by Intuit and used by more practices than any other. With more than 65,000 practices, ProSeries is the leading professional tax software on the market today. We have more satisfied customers than Drake, ATX, or TaxWorks. - New pricing options. You asked for more competitive pricing, and we responded. Now we have unlimited individual and business bundles, and pay-as-you-go options that give you the flexibility to pay for only the returns you need. Plus, I can offer you special multi-year pricing to make your transition even more worthwhile.
Our toll-free U.S.-based support is available right now to help you get up to speed, and throughout the tax season to ensure you’re getting the most out of ProSeries during your busiest times. (In the final week of tax season 2012, our average wait time was only about 2 minutes!)
If you haven’t already decided on a tax software solution, let’s talk. Drop me a line or give me a ring, and let’s chat about how ProSeries can benefit your practice.
{!User.Name} ProSeries Tax Consultant {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
IMPORTANT: Intuit respects the personal nature of email communication. Every effort is made to offer only information that may be of value to you or your business. If you do not wish to receive marketing email from Intuit in the future, please click here.
If you have any questions or comments, please DO NOT REPLY to this email. Contact Customer Service at 800.765.7777 for assistance. If you receive an email message that appears to come from Intuit but that you suspect is a phishing email, please forward it immediately to spoof@intuit.com. Please visit http://security.intuit.com for additional security information.
® 2012-2013 Intuit Inc. All rights reserved. Intuit, the Intuit logo are trademarks or registered trademarks and/or registered service marks of Intuit Inc. in the United States and other countries. All other marks are the property of their respective owners, should be treated as such, and may be registered in various jurisdictions.
Intuit Inc., Customer Communications, 2800 E. Commerce Center Place, Tucson, AZ 85706
